name: Warlords of the Wastes
description:
Inspired by the hit film Mad Max, warlords of the wastes puts you in the place of a warlord. Command your warband from a top down perspective, move their rally marker to get them to drive across the wastes and watch them convoy across the dunes. 

How to play

Click to move the Warband rally point around the map. Your warband will then drive towards the moved marker and destroy anything in its path.

Ram enemies by driving full speed through them

Fire the turrets by getting within range of your targets

  • 10 unique scenarios to test your commanding skills
  • Use wasteland weaponry to destroy your foes
  • Control a warband of 5-40+ vehicles!
  • Use novel "boid" controls which capture the apocalyptic atmosphere of controlled chaos
  • 2 new songs (https://soundcloud.com/joseph-mills-538028114/road-boss, https://soundcloud.com/joseph-mills-538028114/furious-road)
